Song.title: You Gave Your Life Away
Song.copyright: Paul Baloche and Kathryn Scott © 2007 Integrity’s Hosanna! Music (ASCAP), Leadworship Songs (Adm by Integrity’s Hosanna! Music) and Vertical Worship Songs (ASCAP)

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [E Esus | E Esus | E Esus | E Esus | ]
VERSE 1: [E]You spoke and w[B]orlds were formed [C#m] You breathed and l[A]ife was born [E]You knew that [B]one day you would c[A]ome [E]So far from H[B]eaven’s throne [C#m] Clothed in h[A]uman form [E]You showed the w[B]orld the Father’s l[A]ove
CHORUS: You g[E]ave, you gave your life away You g[B/D#]ave, you gave your life away You g[C#m]ave, you gave your l[B]ife away for m[A]e Your gr[E]ace has broken every chain My [B/D#]sin is gone, my debt’s been paid You [C#m]gave, you gave your l[B]ife away for m[A]e For me[E Esus | E Esus | E Esus | E Esus ]
{new_page} VERSE 2: [E]You lived a s[B]inless life [C#m] Yet you were cr[A]ucified [E]You bought our fr[B]eedom on the cr[A]oss [E]Forsaken f[B]or our sins [C#m] You died and r[A]ose again [E]Jesus you [B]are the Lamb of G[A]od
CHORUS: You g[E]ave, you gave your life away You g[B/D#]ave, you gave your life away You g[C#m]ave, you gave your l[B]ife away for m[A]e Your gr[E]ace has broken every chain My [B/D#]sin is gone, my debt’s been paid You [C#m]gave, you gave your l[B]ife away for m[A]e For me[E Esus | E Esus | E Esus | E Esus ]
BRIDGE: [A]How g[E/G#]lorious [F#m7]is your [E/G#]love If I could s[A]ing for[E/G#]ever it’s [F#m7]not en[E/G#]ough to say [A]How g[E/G#]lorious [F#m7]is your [E/G#]love If I could s[A]ing for[E/G#]ever it’s [F#m7]not en[E/G#]ough to say [A]How glorious[|] [A](to chorus)
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 you spoke and worlds were formed you breathed and life was born you knew that one day you would come so far from heavens throne clothed in human form you showed the world the fathers love chorus you gave you gave your life away you gave you gave your life away you gave you gave your life away for me your grace has broken every chain my sin is gone my debts been paid you gave you gave your life away for me for me verse 2 you lived a sinless life yet you were crucified you bought our freedom on the cross forsaken for our sins you died and rose again jesus you are the lamb of god chorus you gave you gave your life away you gave you gave your life away you gave you gave your life away for me your grace has broken every chain my sin is gone my debts been paid you gave you gave your life away for me for me bridge how glorious is your love if i could sing forever its not enough to say how glorious is your love if i could sing forever its not enough to say how glorious to chorus
